MemoryInfobox.name: To Die For
MemoryInfobox.description: 'An Athens|Athenian spy planned to eliminate a Spartan Commander using the commander's sweet tooth against him.'

General_Description: '''To Die For''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a note left on the [[message board]], and decided to look into it.
Section_Dialogue:
She sought out the [[Athens|Athenian]] spy and addressed him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I got your message on the board. What's going on?''
*'''Man:''' ''The local [[Sparta]]n commander enjoys figs with [[honey]]. I'd like to send him some, but he can't know they're from me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why are you sending him a snack?''
*'''Man:''' ''Not a snack. His last meal.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to deliver it to the Spartan commander.''
*'''Man:''' ''Exactly. It must arrive without a scratch.''
(Accept - I'll handle it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It won't be easy, but I'll take care of it.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you. Please be quick.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get going.''
Kassandra sought out the commander and spoke to him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Someone thought you might need this.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you,''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''. Please, take this.''
The man took the supplies, and gave Kassandra her reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
